    • Method Detail

      • doubleSolenoid

        public static Solenoid doubleSolenoid(int extendChannel,
                                      int retractChannel,
                                      Solenoid.Direction initialDirection)
        Create a double-acting solenoid that uses the specified channels on the default module.
        Parameters:
        extendChannel - the channel that extends the solenoid
        retractChannel - the channel that retracts the solenoid
        initialDirection - the initial direction for the solenoid; may not be null
        Returns:
        a solenoid on the specified channels; never null

      • doubleSolenoid

        public static Solenoid doubleSolenoid(int module,
                                      int extendChannel,
                                      int retractChannel,
                                      Solenoid.Direction initialDirection)
        Create a double-acting solenoid that uses the specified channels on the given module.
        Parameters:
        module - the module for the channels
        extendChannel - the channel that extends the solenoid
        retractChannel - the channel that retracts the solenoid
        initialDirection - the initial direction for the solenoid; may not be null
        Returns:
        a solenoid on the specified channels; never null

      • relay

        public static Relay relay(int channel)
        Create a relay on the specified channel.
        Parameters:
        channel - the channel the relay is connected to
        Returns:
        a relay on the specified channel
